_header: O mistress why / Outcast am I
_description: On an inconstant mistress — four 8-line stanzas (aaabcccb)

BLHar2252.First Lines: O mestres whyeOwte caste am I…
BLHar2252.Last Lines: …To haue free chayse& spede as well
